safety_measures.clean_area: Floors and overhead swept clean of combustibles.
safety_measures.combustible_movement: Combustibles and vulnerable equipment moved to a distance of at least 50 feet or protected by fire resistant covers.
safety_measures.openings_covered: Floor and wall openings covered or plugged by fire resistant covers.
safety_measures.supply_lines_purged: Supply lines purged of all combustibles and flammable liquids and/or gases.
safety_measures.ducts_shutdown: When working on ducts all fans shut down and dampers closed.
safety_measures.fire_watch: Fire watch provided for at least 1/2 hour after welding is completed including patrol of floor above and below.
safety_measures.fire_watch_equipment: Fire watch supplied with extinguishing equipment.
safety_measures.dust_collectors_shutdown: All dust collectors shutdown and dampers closed.

permit.confined_space_tests: In confined spaces combustible gas and oxygen deficiency tests conducted.
permit.ventilation: Forced ventilation device used if natural ventilation is not sufficient.
permit.ppe: Welder and helper provided with necessary personal protective equipment.
permit.welding_curtains: Suitable welding curtains in place to contain hot sparks and flash.
permit.security_notification: Security notified before welding/cutting work starts in isolated areas and during weekends and holidays.

operator.equipment_condition: Welding and cutting equipment in good repair.
operator.ppe_usage: Personal protective equipment used, i.e., welding hood, fire resistant apparel, gloves, and respiratory protection as required.
operator.permit_posting: Welding permit conspicuously posted during and after welding.

additional_info.delivery: Deliver to Security if needed for fire watch.
